Dear Mr. Extremezone,
First of all, thank you so very much for the great entertainment over the many years. I am old and hard of hearing and use subtitles for all the movies I can. FXG uploads always contain a subtitle .srt file that for me makes the movie so much more enjoyable. If you could include a subtitle .srt file with your movies, I and the many delft and hard of hearing fans would be forever in your debt. If this is impossible, I do understand and keep doing the good work you are doing.. Thank you again.
Marvin

@Marv70 i usually upload scene releases-or personal but as soon as they are available (sometimes few minutes after a specific group announce time) , FXG uploads movies after few days far on the original release and this is the reason i don't include subtitles...also some groups don't release a movie with subpack and all needs few days to make others subs

after downloading a movie make a search on (i you can't find none try again in 2-3 days): 

subscene.com
opensubtitles.org
tinysubs.com

google for more
